data.eml:eml: Two new remarkable genera and two new species of Gyponini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Iassinae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Domahovski, Alexandre C., Cavichioli, Rodney R. (2018): Two new remarkable genera and two new species of Gyponini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Iassinae) from Brazil. European Journal of Taxonomy 476: 1-17, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.476
